divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out of my friends house when I saw an egg shaped object in the sky. At first I thought it was a cloud, but it was too low and no other clouds in the sky. Then iI was thinking that it was a puff of exhaust smoke from a disel engine or something, but it did not fluctuate or dissipate with time. It was perfectly still. The object appeared to be over the top of the water pumping station for the area. Then my friend walked out of her house and I said to her "look, is that weird since there is no othjer clouds in the sky?" as we both looked away from the object - to look at the sky all around us. then it was just gone, there for 5 to 7 minutes grayish in color and then gone
Summary: looked like an cloud but sharp edge and no fluctuation to shape.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 15th 2001
